"This stuff is great. I use it in my whirley pop and it makes perfect popcorn. Flavor is pretty darn close to movie theater. Everyone in my family loves this stuff. I do like a bit more salt on my popcorn but this can be a bit too salty even for me. I cut the salt pack open before the rest and take out the salt. I would say I use about half to 3/4 what comes in the pack. Then I cut the rest of the pack open and dump it all in. This is about the right amount of salt for me. The only problem is the salt is butter flavored so you loose a bit of flavor doing this. I'd say make a batch like normal first and then adjust the salt to taste if needed. That's an easy fix. I save the salt and then I use it for future popcorn making without the kit.

meats. At 340 degrees the coating browned beyond what I desired and burned. I reduced the heat to 225-250
degrees and obtained perfect results for my style of cooking. I did notice that it was better not to stir
or turn meat portions until the coating browned some (a minute or so) which prevented coating from falling
off meat. It is a good idea that you remove any flakes from your fryer between removal of finished meat and

cause the flakes to burn and ruin your oil and meat. ,

"I've had quite a few different jasmine tea pearls and they come in a variety of grades. These superior grade specimens from Summit are just that. After trying different Lavazza espresso whole beans i wanted to give this
one a try and ordered Lavazza Grand Espresso .I have checked the UK and
German sites to get some idea about the rating for this one since there are not enough reviews for this one. The ratings were not very impressive compare
to other Lavazza Whole Beans ( very close to Lavazza Super crema which i
have ordered through Amazon )but i wanted to make my own experience .

When i oppened the package i saw seemingly oily coffee beans compare to other Lavazza or Illy Espresso beans.

I have a Miele automatic espresso machine which was not very amused about
his new partner but it was too late to refuse the experiment.

Grand Espresso has a very good Crema which is a result of high Robusta and normal bucket( aroma ) .Composition 40% Arabica 60 % Robusta .

As Cappuccino i was not very impressed compare to other Lavazza Espresso
Beans .It tastes very weak ( i have used Whole Foods Whole Milk ).

At the end you get what you have paid for. A lavazza brand which is in the
bottom of Lavazza Whole beans next to Lavazza super Crema and Lavazza Tierra.

For me the first choice for Lavazza Espresso is Pienaroma if it is fresh ( i

"I recently cut fiber one bars out of my diet after I noticed that I get all the fiber I need in a day just by eating whole wheat bread	,

"Fiber one bars actually don't have real fiber.  They contain inulin (from chicory root) which is technically fiber because the body can't digest it.  Unfortunately fiber is defined by anything that can't be broken down easily.  These bars do not contain REAL fiber. (The real fiber usually found in whole grain breads and cereals) So if it says ""chicory root"" or ""inulin"" in the ingredients	,
